    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AppView
    UI contract used by Controller
    Controller
    Coordinates the flow between the view and the domain model.
    ModelOperationException
    Signals issues while manipulating immutable model objects
    Project
    Immutable representation of a Jira-like project Project instances carry only identifier and name, while related tasks are managed by TaskRepository
    ProjectRepository
    In-memory repository responsible for managing projects Repository generates identifiers for projects and guarantees that returned model objects remain immutable This implementation focuses on project lifecycle operations.
    ProjectStore
    Persistence contract for projects
    SimpleJira
    Application entry point creating dependencies and launching the controller Accepts up to three optional command-line arguments: a project name and an optional initial task title and description.
    Task
    Immutable representation of a single task within a project
    TaskPriority
    Enumeration representing the possible priorities of a task
    TaskRepository
    In-memory repository managing tasks assigned to projects The repository delegates project existence validation to ProjectStore.findById(int) and keeps task data immutable See Task for the task model and ModelOperationException for domain errors thrown by this class
    TaskStatus
    Enumeration representing the possible statuses of a task
    TaskStore
    Persistence contract for tasks
    View
    Console based view responsible for presenting information to the user The view renders projects, tasks, and menus while delegating input collection to the controller
